class.name: HashiCorpVaultConnection
class.description: Stores information and configuration for the access to a HashiCorp Vault.

param.name: namespace
param.description: Parameter Namespace. Should be provided in case of multiple vault connections

param.name: vault-namespace
param.description: HashiCorp Vault namespace that the auth method and secrets engines are housed under.

param.name: auth-method
param.description: The way how to obtain credentials (just provide the keys, assume IAM role or other)

param.name: path
param.description: Path of the ldap authentication backend mount

param.name: fail-on-error
param.description: Whether to fail builds in case of parameter resolving error

example.description: Adds a new Connection that allows TeamCity to connect to a HashiCorpVault using AppRole
